entry.title: WIND WARNING , Okotoks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Black Diamond 04:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 90 over southern sections this morning. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
